Title: Da Kunnin’ Krew
Legend: Da Kunnin’ Krew is a ragtag collection of orruks, hobgrots and grots. It is led by the armoured Torka Tuffskul, an expert at corralling foes with his spiked mansnappa. He is backed up by two grots, Gikkit and Shank, who are kept in line by a malicious paymaster known as Krookgrin.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Single, Unique. Mannok da Kunnin’ and Da Kunnin’ Krew units must be taken as a set. Although taken as a set, each is a separate unit.

Intro: The models in Da Kunnin’ Krew are Torka Tuffskul, Gikkit, Shank and Krookgrin. Torka Tuffskul is armed with a Mansnappa. Gikkit is armed with Krule Irons. Shank is armed with a Krude Net. Krookgrin is armed with a Krule Dagger and Firebombs.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: Torka Tuffskul is the unit champion. Add 1 to that model’s Wounds characteristic.

Rules.Name: Snatcha-Krew
Rules.Fluff: Da Kunnin’ Krew are constantly on the lookout for new victims to grab and chain up.
Rules.Rule: Snatcha-krew: At the end of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy model within 2" of this unit and roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if this unit includes Torka Tuffskul, and add 1 to the roll if this unit includes Shank. If the roll is at least double that model’s Wounds characteristic, it is slain.

Rules.Name: Paymaster
Rules.Fluff: Krookgrin the hobgrot is Da Kunnin’ Krew’s paymaster, and as long as he is still standing, the rest of the Krew will not desert him.
Rules.Rule: Do not take battleshock tests for this unit if it includes Krookgrin.
